Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.Episode: Recreating Wetlands, Mapping the Ocean Floor and Watching the Brain Work
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Find out how science is turning back the clock on 100 years of industrial salt production to restore healthy wetlands and see the secrets of the ocean floor using sound and laser technology. And, the thought process of human brain, once a black box, are being explored in new ways.

Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.Episode: Science of Big Waves, Spider Boat and Killer Tree Disease
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The monster waves at Mavericks attract big wave surfers from around the world. But what makes them so big? And, engineer Ugo Conti who has sailed the world has always suffered from seasickness. See his "Proteus" design- a spider-like sea craft made for smoother sailing. And Sudden Oak Death is a killer with no cure and it's devastating oak trees around the world.

Clip.Title: SPACE SHUTTLE: FINAL COUNTDOWN
Clip.EpisodeSummary: July 21, 2011 marked not only the end of the space shuttle program, but the end of an era. Over the last 30 years, the shuttles Atlantis, Columbia, Challenger, Discovery and Endeavour have had many triumps and tragedies, as told by the astronauts, NASA scientists, and designers who helped this ambitious program take flight.

Clip.Title: MAGNIFICA ITALIA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Tuscany is one of the most charming region of Italy with its renaissance heritage and artistic sites and beautiful and world renowned valleys and islands where ancient traditions meet the good life with some of the best wines and foods of Italy.

Clip.Title: WARSHIPS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Ride along with a Canadian fleet of Warships as they patrol the Persian Gulf.

Clip.Title: CANADA 1812: FORGED IN FIRE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: An east coast shipper creates a private naval fleet to seize American ships.

Clip.Title: CANADA 1812: FORGED IN FIRE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The Americans are invading and Lower Canada is undermanned, forcing Charles de Salaberry to rely on cunning tactics.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The Eastern Coastline of New Brunswick is an ecological wonder- this aerial survey soars above incredible rock formations, peat farms, and some of the East Coast's most impressive sand dunes.

Clip.Title: GREEN PARADISE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Discover destinations around the world, where local economies protect natural resources and wildlife diversity.

Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.Episode: Emotions Revealed, Future History, Amateur Astronomers and 3-D Microscopes
Clip.EpisodeSummary: See how our facial muscles involuntarily reveal emotions like sadness and anger. And, what does our use of bottled water say about us? And, some of the world's most passionate astronomers don't even need to leave their own backyards. And cutting-edge microscopes are helping to create new medical breakthroughs.

Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.Episode: Chasing Beetles, Finding Darwin and Ladybug Mystery
Clip.EpisodeSummary: When Charles Darwin published "On the Origin of Species," he transformed the biological sciences forever. 150 years later, Darwin's ideas remain as central to scientific exploration as ever. Entomologist David Kavanaugh, who discovered a new species of beetle in 1980, predicted that a second new beetle species would be found in the same area. Find out if his prediction came true.

Clip.Title: AERIAL FRANCE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Get an up close look at the beautiful French landscape from above and a taste of the rich culture on the stunning coasts.

Clip.Title: WALRUS TV
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In depth vignettes on issues impacting modern Canadians, taken from the pages of the popular Magazine.

Clip.Title: WALRUS TV
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In depth vignettes on issues impacting modern Canadians, taken from the pages of the popular Magazine.

Clip.Title: L.A. FROCK STARS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Being L.A.'s "vintage fashion guru" means that Doris Raymond must maintain the best inventory in the city and she makes sure the whole town knows about her timeless pieces. See how she generates priceless word of mouth when international trendsetter Jason Campbell pays her a visit.

Clip.Title: L.A. FROCK STARS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Join the bidding war and discover what it takes to make it in the increasingly competitive world of vintage fashion. Follow Doris, along with her store manager Sarah and fashion consultant Kyle, as they fly to New York and prepare to bid at the highly competitive Augusta Auction - one of the few auction houses in America that specializes solely in vintage clothing, rare textiles, and costume jewelry. This shopping spree will put Doris and her team to the test.

Clip.Title: REAL STORY; THE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Get the real story behind some of the silver screen's most iconic films and characters.

Clip.Title: THE ORIGINS OF OZ
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The story of Dorothy's adventures in Oz have been seen and read by millions. Now learn the true story of the man behind the curtain, author L. Frank Baum.
